Sea to Sky

Hotel

The Sea to Sky Hotel is nestled in the Garibaldi Provincial Park on the Sea to Sky Hwy, a few minutes north of Squamish, 70 km away from Vancouver B.C. and 30 minutes drive to Whistler, the North Americaâ€™s foremost all year-round mountain resort. Outside our doors are unlimited attractions, outdoor activities, and shopping.

Rooms

All of our 50 oversized guest rooms and suites are tastefully decorated with stunning mountain views and are suitable for groups and events, business or pleasurable romantic getaway.
